subject: p10410641
raw_hist: Right pleural effusion, evaluate status post thoracentesis. CHEST, SINGLE AP PORTABLE VIEW. Compared with at 14:43 pm, there has been interval decrease in the size of the right effusion. There remains a moderate to moderately large right effusion, with additional fluid tracking in the minor fissure. However, the component that tracked along the upper lateral right chest wall into the right apex is no longer visualized. There is underlying collapse and/or consolidation at the right base. The mediastinum remains midline. Again seen is increased retrocardiac density and a small left effusion. No CHF. No pneumothorax detected on either side.
raw_impr: Interval decrease in size of right effusion, though a moderate to moderately-large right effusion remains. No pneumothorax detected.
